response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to you, and I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase it from me. My proposal is to sell it to you for $1,350,000. This price reflects its true worth while allowing us to reach a fair agreement. I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for both of us to benefit from this transaction. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1350000}
